description: Index of 2^n within sequence of numbers of form 2^i*3^j.
links: Moshe Levin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
N. Carey, Lambda Words: A Class of Rich Words Defined Over an Infinite Alphabet, arXiv preprint arXiv:1303.0888, 2013
mathematica: c[0] = 1; c[n_] := 1 + Sum[Ceiling[j*Log[3, 2]], {j, n}]; Table[c[i], {i, 0, 60}] (* _Norman Carey_, Jun 13 2012 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_
